rows.label: tlk01000806_msg0001
rows.name:
They say the Village Guardian is
a "historical structure," too!

rows.label: tlk01000806_msg0002
rows.name:
And we have to take good care
of historical structures!

rows.label: tlk01000806_msg0003
rows.name:
...I should keep it a secret that I
climbed on top of the Guardian to play.

rows.label: tlk01000806_msg0101
rows.name:
I'm not good at salvaging...
Because a monster appeared
in Rex-niichan's lesson...

rows.label: tlk01000806_msg0102
rows.name:
But Toatoa-sensei cheered me on,
so I'm doing my best to dive!

rows.label: tlk01000806_msg0103
rows.name:
If I do a good dive, I get a reward!
I get to pet his fluffy fur!
Ehehe...
